EmailTemplate.description: This is a test email alert that goes out to RM/LA of that Product package/loan when Product Package loans have finished their approval processes.
EmailTemplate.name: PP-Product Package Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: The Following Product Package is Ready for Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The Product Package {!LLC_BI__Product_Package__c.Name} has been approved and is ready for further review.
Click here for the Product Package details: {!LLC_BI__Product_Package__c.Link}
Thank You.
